donor_name: UNITED NATIONS INTER-AGENCY SECRETARIAT FOR THE INTERNATIONAL STRATEGY FOR DISASTER REDUCTION.
outputs.output_descr:
1. National Disaster Management Policy, Strategy and Legal Framework developed and Standards for Disaster Risk reduction developed and integrated into national development planning by end 2008

2. Sectoral Preparedness and Contingency Plans developed at national, local and community levels, and capacity built in disaster management

3. Networks on Tsunami Early warning Systems developed locally and internationally .

project_title: Early warning and Disaster Mgmt System in Seychelles
